text: Abange mmwe abakkiriza (bwe munaabeeranga mu mikolo gya Hijja ne Umrah) Katonda ajja kubagezesa n’ensonga y’okuyigga ebisolo nga mubikwata n’emikono gyammwe, era nga mubifumita n'amafumu gammwe olwo nno Katonda alyoke amanye oyo amutya mu mmwe, awamu n’okuba nti tamulabako, oyo yenna an’amenya e tteeka lino oluvanyuma lw’okumanya bino agenda kutuusibwako e bibonerezo e biruma e nnyo
